text: Andrew Reed Garbarino ( ; born September 27, 1984) is an American attorney and politician. He has been the U.S. representative for New York's 2nd congressional district since 2021. He is a member of the Republican Party. Before, he was in the New York State Assemblyman for the 7th district from 2013 to 2020. ==References== ==Other websites== * Representative Andrew Garbarino official U.S. House website * The New York Assembly: Andrew R.
